item.title: My Readings
item.description: Non Fiction Man’s search for Meaning The Brain : The Story of You Autobiography of a Yogi Sapiens : A Brief History of Humankind Homo Deus How to win friends and Influence People Working with Emotional Intelligence The Rational Optimist : How Prosperity Evolves Reignited 21 lessons of the 21st century Almanack of Naval Ravikant Science And Maths A brief history of Time Godel Escher Bach : A golden Triad Reality is not what it seems Femats’s Last Theorem The Codebook Fiction Adventures of Feluda All of Dan Brown Shiva Trilogy 1984
